name: Networking Scoring
description: Scoring template for Networking super-sector patents. Includes protocol relevance and scalability metrics.

questions.question: How relevant is this patent to core networking protocols and standards? Consider TCP/IP, routing protocols, SDN, and network management protocols.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Identify relevant protocols and standards this patent relates to.

questions.question: Does this patent address scalability challenges in networking? Consider bandwidth optimization, latency reduction, connection handling, and traffic management.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Describe scalability improvements and their practical impact.

questions.question: How fundamental is this patent to modern network architectures (cloud, edge, data center, enterprise)?
questions.reasoningPrompt: Identify which network architectures benefit from this technology.
